title: Escalating Tensions In West Asia: India Calls For Restraint By All Sides
content: In its first reaction to fresh escalation of tensions in West Asia, India on Wednesday called for restraint by all sides and said the conflict must not take a wider regional dimension.
summary: In its first reaction to fresh escalation of tensions in West Asia, India on Wednesday called for restraint by all sides and said the conflict must not take a wider regional dimension.

title: Fact Check: Did Netanyahu Run Into A Bunker During Iran's Missile Attack?
content: Following Iran's massive rocket attack on Israel Tuesday night, video clips circulating on social media showed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu allegedly running for cover inside a bunker.
summary: Following Iran's massive rocket attack on Israel Tuesday night, video clips circulating on social media showed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu allegedly running for cover inside a bunker.

title: Over 100 People To Sue US Rapper Sean 'Diddy' Combs In Sex Assault Case
content: More than 100 people, including dozens of children, who say they were victims of rape, sexual assault and sexual exploitation at the hands of Sean "Diddy" Combs are to sue the US rap star, a lawyer said Tuesday.
summary: More than 100 people, including dozens of children, who say they were victims of rape, sexual assault and sexual exploitation at the hands of Sean "Diddy" Combs are to sue the US rap star, a lawyer said Tuesday.

title: How Successful Were Missile Attacks? What Iran And Israel Said

title: "Avoid Non-Essential Travel": India's Advisory Amid Iran-Israel Conflict
content: Indians have been asked to avoid travelling to Iran after they launched a massive missile attack on Israel while those already present in the country have been asked to stay vigilant.

title: Inside "True Promise II": What Changed In Iran's Latest Attack On Israel
content: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) launched its second missile attack against Israel in less than six months, targeting military bases on Tuesday.

title: Analysis: Yes, Calling Someone Mentally Disabled Causes Real Harm
content: In a recent speech, Donald Trump used the language of intelligence, or intellectual impairment, as a weapon against Kamala Harris. And he used similar language about Vice presidential candidate Tim Walz in a TV appearance.

title: Did Trump Lose 2020 Election? His Veep Pick JD Vance Refuses To Say
content: Republican vice presidential candidate JD Vance has refused to acknowledge that Donald Trump lost the 2020 elections.

title: Who is JD Vance, The Republican Vice-Presidential Pick?
content: JD Vance is a politician, an author and a Marine veteran who has been serving as junior senator from Ohio.
summary: JD Vance is a politician, an author and a Marine veteran who has been serving as junior senator from Ohio.

title: Explained: What Is The Iron Dome, Israel's Anti-Missile Cover Since 2011
content: Israel's Iron Dome air defence system has intercepted thousands of rockets since it went into operation in 2011, providing the country with crucial cover during times of conflict.
summary: Israel's Iron Dome air defence system has intercepted thousands of rockets since it went into operation in 2011, providing the country with crucial cover during times of conflict.

title: India "Very Much" Concerned About Middle East Tensions: S Jaishankar
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Tuesday that India is "very much" concerned at the possibility of broadening of the conflict in the Middle East.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Tuesday that India is "very much" concerned at the possibility of broadening of the conflict in the Middle East.

title: Australian Man Held For Distributing App That Was 'Whatsapp For Criminals'
content: An Australian man has been charged with distributing the encrypted messaging app known as "Ghost", allegedly used by criminals across the globe to arrange drug deals and violence, police said Wednesday.
summary: An Australian man has been charged with distributing the encrypted messaging app known as "Ghost", allegedly used by criminals across the globe to arrange drug deals and violence, police said Wednesday.

title: Iran's Missile Capabilities Explained

title: Solar Eclipse On October 2: How Fast It Will Travel
content: The much-anticipated annular solar eclipse is set to grace the skies on October 2. The eclipse will begin at 9:13 pm IST on October 2 and conclude at 3:17 pm IST the next day.
summary: The much-anticipated annular solar eclipse is set to grace the skies on October 2. The eclipse will begin at 9:13 pm IST on October 2 and conclude at 3:17 pm IST the next day.

title: 'Israel's Chance To Change Face Of Middle East': Ex PM After Iran Offensive
content: Iran's missile offensive against Israel was a "terrible mistake" and Tel Aviv has its greatest opportunity in 50 years to change the face of the Middle East, former Israel Prime Minister Naftali Bennett has said.

title: New Study Shows Music Can Boost Plant Growth
content: Playing a monotonous sound stimulates the activity of a fungus that promotes plant growth, a study suggested on Wednesday, raising the potential that playing music could be good for crops and gardens.
summary: Playing a monotonous sound stimulates the activity of a fungus that promotes plant growth, a study suggested on Wednesday, raising the potential that playing music could be good for crops and gardens.

title: "Iran Destabilizing Force In Middle East": Kamala Harris On Missile Attacks

title: When Israel And Iran Joined Hands To Fight A Common Enemy
content: Iran on Tuesday fired 200 missiles, including hypersonic weapons, at Israel as tensions in the Middle East reach breaking point. Israel has vowed that Iran will "pay" for the attack. But relations between the two countries were not always sour.

title: JD Vance Vs Tim Walz: Five Key Takeaways From US Vice Presidential Debate
content: US vice-presidential debates traditionally have little effect on the White House race, but with Republican Donald Trump and Democrat Kamala Harris neck-and-neck, the stakes were higher than usual in New York on Tuesday.

title: Video: Massive Crater Near Mossad HQ After Iran's Big Missile Offensive
content: One of the 180-odd ballistic missiles Iran fired last night landed near the Tel Aviv headquarters of Israeli intelligence service Mossad. A video that has emerged on social media shows a massive crater near the Mossad headquarters
